attributes.review: this app made me very disappointed with its services when i read the reviews i thought nothing of them but now that i have the app it’s a disgrace to the trump community and as a trump supporter i might take a different party into my consideration
attributes.title: Don’t even try this app

attributes.review: After downloading the app it took over 24 hours to download and continues to make my phone go nuts whenever I even try to open the app...😭 I just wanted to discover more about my wonderful president❤️
attributes.title: I think my phone is broken

attributes.review: i downloaded it and it took FOREVER to download i entered my phone number and next thing i know my social media is all hacked and deleted 😐THEY BOOT GANGED MY ACCOUNTS😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿. trump 2020 tho 🇺🇸😛 because my president is the best even tho he is a rapist and a racist and homophobic . Still love him tho haha. Anyways the app hacked me 🙄 thank you and goodbye ❤️
attributes.title: THIS APP HACKED ALL MY SOCIAL MEDIA 😡😾

attributes.review: You enter you’re in information for what? You’re Racist ,and you say you’re going to make America great again well how’s that going for you .First:tons of people have died from coronavirus , and don’t even care about how racist the police have been.
attributes.title: Michell Obama 2020

attributes.review: so to start my phone crashed as soon as i downloaded this app. then i started getting a lot of problems with my phone, i was really not expecting much considering it’s made by the president, I WOULD NOT RECOMMEND THIS APP TO ANYONE and i think it deserves 0 stars, HORRIBLE SERVICE AND I THINK THEY COULD DO BETTER🤢🤢🤢🤢😤😤😤😤🤬🤬🤬😒
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: The app took FOREVER to download. It won’t even go past the loading screen to launch the app? I got past the losing screen ONE TIME. Put in my phone number to send reminders and information and it crashed on me... This is awful.
attributes.title: I can’t.

attributes.review: I downloaded this is app so I could support the best president (Donald Trump). But it took way too long to download and when it was downloaded it was all just tweets that make no sense. Honestly I would advise against getting this app, it is a waste of time and doesn’t help trump at all.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Omg so like my pet rhino said 😳like dont download this app 🤓but like the stuttery 😬person 😨I am 😦was like hehe😛 I wanted to see if I was powerful enough to twist his mind and 🙂he was mine screwed😱 by me but when I opened it I seen too much 🍊🍊 so I was like omg 😱my eyes 👁👁and my pet rhino, dinosaur, pigeon, and whale said 👁👅👁🙄I told you
attributes.title: I cant even🦄🧚‍♀️🦋

attributes.review: This app took hours to download and when it finsihed it took longer to start. Everything was all over the place and it was hard to navigate around the app. Definitely should upgrade
attributes.title: Unacceptable

attributes.userName: i dont like to leave reveiws
attributes.review: This app is glitchy, and made my old iPhone 6s crash! Very unhappy with the bold text, over all it’s just sloppy. This app also seems like a way for our president to control what his followers see and believe. Terrible, just terrible. Shaking my head 😕
attributes.title: Controlled media 😡
